item.title: Trump Administration’s Halt of CDC’s Weekly Scientific Report Stalls Bird Flu Studies
item.description: An unprecedented freeze on the agency’s Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report sparks new concerns about political meddling in science.

item.title: Telehealth Companies Boost Ad Spending While Taking on More Complex Medicine

item.title: Readers Offer Their Takes on the Opioid Crisis, Family Doctor Shortage, and Vaccine Policies
item.description: KFF Health News gives readers a chance to comment on a recent batch of stories.

item.title: Sports Betting Is Coming to Missouri. A Fund To Help Prevent Problem Gambling Will Follow.
item.description: Can a $5 million compulsive-gambling fund help Missouri avoid the mistakes of other states that have legalized sports betting?

item.title: Led by RFK Jr., Conservatives Embrace Raw Milk. Regulators Say It’s Dangerous.
